text: Thomas Ryder (May 9, 1863 – July 18, 1935) was a 19th-century professional baseball outfielder. He played for the St. Louis Maroons of the Union Association in July and August 1884. ==External links== Category:1863 births Category:1935 deaths Category:Major League Baseball outfielders Category:St. Louis Maroons players Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Baseball players from Iowa
title: Tom Ryder (baseball)
